dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Includes illustrations of ships on the oceans and sea monsters. Title cartouche includes three angels. Does not match any states listed in Van Der Krogt. From the Appendix Atlas of the British Isles and Northern Europe, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 37 x 50 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.,Hondius, Hendrik, 1597-1651. Appendix Atlas of the British Isles and Northern Europe.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Appendix Atlas of the British Isles and Northern Europe.
